Title: January 2012
Content: 10*p39848a01024**15 in a fluorescent lighting tube, electrons with a range of kinetic energies collide with atoms of mercury vapour.  these atoms are initially in their ground state.  as a result of these collisions, some of the atoms emit photons. explain what is meant by the ground state of an atom and why photons are emitted.(6)(total for question 15 = 6 marks)
